latestInspection.result: Inspection Result Initial Annual Inspection - Passed inspection with no violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient number of toilets and sinks for the number of children in attendance
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection it was determined that child care service failed to take any and all necessary action to eliminate potential hazards
violations.Category: Violations requiring correction within two weeks Critical Violations

violations.Violation Summary: At time of inspection required hand wash signs were not provided
At time of inspection child care service failed to provide sufficient lighting and or failed to maintain adequate foot candles in areas used by children
There were no new violations observed at the time of this inspection/visit
At time of inspection it was determined that individual associated with child care service/camp involved in an act detrimental to health and safety
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to provide constant and competent supervision for children within its care
violations.Category: Violations requiring immediate correction Public Health Hazards

violations.Violation Summary: Child care service failed to notify DOHMH within 24 hours of child abuse allegation/indication or record of criminal activity of individuals associated with child care service serious injury death or loss of a child
